# Flat Creek (Stewarts Creek tributary)

Flat Creek is a  long 1st order tributary to Stewarts Creek in Carroll County, Virginia, United States.
Course
Flat Creek rises about  west of Sams Knob in Carroll County and then flows east to join Stewarts Creek about  southwest of Lambsburg, Virginia.
Watershed
Flat Creek drains  of area, receives about 52.9 in/year of precipitation, has a wetness index of 283.63, and is about 84% forested.
See also
* List of rivers of Virginia
